name: Bulgarian Old Catholic Church
goal: For our main mission, we have taken care of the Bulgarian diaspora, especially the one on the territory of Europe. We are doing this by serving liturgies, as well as perform other activities related to the life of our diaspora and our church.
interests: Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Migration and asylum, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Legislative initiatives regarding education and human rights.
